info.name: Project Free TV - Modern
info.description:
A modern style for Project Free TV. Check out the add-on as well.
It is highly recommended that you use an adblocker while using this style.

UPDATE: Applied fix for new ".info" domain.
info.additionalInfo:
A modern style for Project Free TV:
http://www.free-tv-video-online.info

Add-On:
http://userstyles.org/styles/96482/project-free-tv-large-videos

This is an evolution of the last style that I made. The colors are more muted so they don't stand out too much while watching videos. I wanted something bold that gave the feel of a modern take on the old movie theater fronts without being too flashy.

-Dark Theme! No More Orange!
-Lots of tweaks and adjustments to padding, alignment, and font size. 
-The movie section is now styled!
-Home page is styled!
-Search Bar is Back!
-Videos can be Stretched to the full width of the style with addon!

It is highly recommended that you use an adblocker while using this style.

Enjoy!

---

Add-ons:
Large Videos: http://userstyles.org/styles/96482/project-free-tv-large-videos

---

Update (1/4):
++ Updated the css to fix issues with changes to the site.
++ Updated font sizes in search bar

Update (12/29):
++ Updated the navigation bar. Updated Preview Image.

Update(12/25):
++ Fixed a bug for overlays that show episode information.

Thanks and don't forget to leave a comment!
